name: Donut City Tycoon
description:
Decreasing food standards has increased the demand for exotic desserts! Many new tycoons have emerged, thinking that donuts is the best donut to fill the sugar craving of the world. Each tycoon with their secret donut recipe is getting in on the gold rush and sell as many donuts as they can.

Glaze donuts, build cloning centers, hire truck drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced donut city in the world.

An incremental clicker game at its core, Donut City Tycoon uses many elements from clicker and simulation games that give it a one of kind feel. Enjoy the 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a cluster of donuts. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient donut city.

More experienced incremental clicker players and players familiar with Mindstorm Studios simulation games will love the new gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a huge donut city with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.

Features
- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself
- Donuts swarm!
- Hundreds of research items
- Hundreds of missions
- Many different brewing centers and shipping vehicles
- An elaborate Prestige system has the game always feeling new
- Wonderful 3D graphics
